faq.title: FAQ
faq.track_order_q: How can I track my order status?
faq.track_order_a: Go to the Orders page and tap any order to see its current status and delivery details.
faq.edit_address_q: Can I edit my delivery address?
faq.edit_address_a: Yes, you can change your address from the 'My Addresses' page before placing the order.
faq.payment_methods_a: We currently support cash on delivery. Online payment will be added soon.
faq.return_product_a: Yes, within 3 days of receipt, provided it is in its original condition.
